DOC.brief_summary: The purpose multicenter , open-label , observational , post-marketing surveillance study collect long term safety efficacy information growth hormone ( GH ) product : Protropin ( somatrem injection ) , Nutropin ( somatropin injection ) , Nutropin AQ ( somatropin injection ) , Nutropin Depot ( somatropin injectable suspension ) treatment pediatric growth disorder GH prescribe .
DOC.brief_title: National Cooperative Growth Study ( NCGS ) : A Post-marketing Surveillance Program Nutropin , Nutropin AQ , Nutropin Depot , Protropin
DOC.criteria: Participants open epiphyses Children either sex treat Nutropin Depot , Nutropin AQ , Nutropin , Protropin treatment growth failure Participants willing keep follow appointment throughout study participation Participants treat nonGenentech GH preparation Participants close epiphysis Participants active neoplasia
